A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was very disappointing for a Star Wars film in which the audience looked for answers to the questions from The Force Awakens. Many of these questions have either stupid answers (Rey's parents) or are not answered at all (who is Snoke?). Rey is the ultimate Mary Sue in that she knows how to do everything better than anyone\, and there is a horribly boring and stupid side quest with Finn and a new character named Rose. Rose may be the worst character in a Star Wars movie since Jar Jar Binks came along. Poe Dameron is still flawless and you never get a sense that he could be killed throughout the entire movie. The visuals and score of this movie are great\, but the story-writing\, uninteresting new characters\, and gaps in the plot ruin what could have been an amazing movie.
